contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kawamoto'''|川本町|Kawamoto-machi}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Ōsato District, Saitama|Ōsato District]], [[Saitama Prefecture|Saitama]], [[Japan]]. As of 2005, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 12,120 and a [[population density|density]] of 556.7 persons per km². The total area was 21.77 km². On January 1, 2006 Kawamoto, along with the towns of [[Hanazono, Saitama|Hanazono]] and [[Okabe, Saitama|Okabe]], all from [[Ōsato District, Saitama|Ōsato District]], was merged into the expanded city of [[Fukaya, Saitama|Fukaya]]. ==External links== * [http://www.city.fukaya.saitama.jp/ Official website of Fukaya] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Saitama Prefecture]] {{Saitama-geo-stub}}
